movies.name: Black Widow
movies.storyLine: Black Widow is a superhero movie based on the Marvel comic character of the same name.  It is the 24th film in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and Walt Disney Studios Motion Pitcures distributing the movie worldwide.  Directed by Cate Shortland, the film stars Scarlet Johnson in the titular role.

movies.name: The Conjuring 3: The Devil Made Me Do It
movies.storyLine: The Conjuring 3 or The Conjuring: The Devil Made Me Do It is an American supernatural horror film directed by Michael Chaves. It's a sequel to the 2013's The Conjuring and 2016's The Conjuring 2. Patrick Wilson and Vera Farmiga reprise their role as Ed and Lorraine Warren. The Flick is based on a murder that took place in 1981 popularly known as the ` Trial of Arne Cheyenne Johnson.'

movies.name: Nomadland
movies.storyLine: A woman in her sixties who, after losing everything in the Great Recession, embarks on a journey through the American West, living as a van-dwelling modern-day nomad.

movies.name: I Care a Lot
movies.cast: Rosamund Pike, Peter Dinklage, Eiza González
movies.storyLine: A shady legal guardian lands in hot water when she tries to bilk a woman who has ties to a powerful gangster.

movies.name: The Dig
movies.storyLine: In the late 1930s, wealthy landowner Edith Pretty hires amateur archaeologist Basil Brown to investigate the mounds on her property in England. He and his team discover a ship from the Dark Ages while digging up a burial ground.

movies.name: The Suicide Squad
movies.cast: Margot Robbie, John Cena, Daniela Melchior, Pete Davidson
movies.storyLine: The government sends the most dangerous supervillains in the world -- Bloodsport, Peacemaker, King Shark, Harley Quinn and others -- to the remote, enemy-infused island of Corto Maltese. Armed with high-tech weapons, they trek through the dangerous jungle on a search-and-destroy mission, with only Col. Rick Flag on the ground to make them behave.

movies.name: Dune
movies.storyLine: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence, only those who can conquer their own fear will survive.

movies.name: Godzilla vs. Kong
movies.cast: Millie Bobby Brown, Rebecca Hall, Alexander Skarsgård
movies.storyLine: King Kong is transported out of his containment zone after Godzilla resurfaces and creates mayhem. Humans need his help to reach Hollow Earth and find a way to subdue the king of the monsters.

movies.name: Netrikan
movies.storyLine: Durga (Nayanthara), a CBI officer loses both her younger brother Aditya and her eyesight in a road accident. However, she tries to rebuild her life with the help of her guide dog, Kanna. On a fateful night, Durga encounters a psycho criminal (Ajmal Ameer), which leads to a cat and mouse game between the duo. How she tracks down the criminal with the help of SI Manikandan (Manikandan) and a young man named Gautham (Sharan Shakti), forms the crux of the story.
movies.criticRev: Netrikann is an engaging thriller that stays true to its genre. Despite the minor flaws, the movie emerges as an effective watch, thanks to the power-packed performances of leading lady Nayanthara and the supporting cast.

movies.name: Raame Aandalum Raavane Aandalum
movies.storyLine: Raame Aandalum Raavane Aandalum is a Tamil drama movie, directed by Arisil Moorthy. The cast of Raame Aandalum Raavane Aandalum includes Ramya Pandian,Vani Bhojan.

movies.name: Lift
movies.storyLine: Lift is an Tamil horror, thriller movie direction by Vineeth Varaprasad and produced by Hepzi. The movie star cast includes Kavin of Bigg Boss fame and Amritha Aiyer in the lead the lead roles.
movies.criticRev: Lift definitely deserves to be watched on big screens, especially for its amazing technical aspects.

movies.name: Maara
movies.storyLine: Maara is a Tamil drama movie, directed by Dhilip Kumar. The cast of Maara includes Madhavan,Shraddha Srinath.

movies.name: Jagame Thanthiram
movies.storyLine: A carefree gangster (Dhanush) is recruited to help the overseas crime lord take down a rival, he is caught off guard by the moral dilemmas that follow.

movies.name: Sarpatta
movies.storyLine: The movie Sarpatta showcases the boxing culture of the 1980s and revolves around a clash between two clans namely Idiyappa Parambarai and Sarpatta Parambarai in North Chennai. Arya played the role of Kabilan, Santhosh Prathap portray a pivotal role in the movie.

movies.name: Navarasa
movies.storyLine: The nine episodes represent a different emotion or rasa such as anger, compassion, courage, disgust, fear, laughter, love, peace, and wonder.

movies.name: Annabelle Sethupathi
movies.storyLine: Annabelle Sethupathi is a Tamil action movie, directed by Deepak Sundarrajan. The cast of Annabelle Sethupathi includes Vijay Sethupathi,Taapsee Pannu.

movies.name: Theeni
movies.cast: Ashok Selvan, Nithya Menen, Ritu Varma
movies.storyLine: Theeni is a Tamil comedy movie, directed by Ani Sasi. The cast of Theeni includes Ashok Selvan,Nithya Menen.

movies.name: Soorarai Pottru
movies.storyLine: Nedumaaran Rajangam aka Maara (Suriya) ex-air force officer from a village in Madurai, who dreams of starting an airline company and make the commoners fly. He falls in love with for Sundari aka Bommi (Aparna Balamurali), a baker, and marries her.Maara meets his idol Paresh Goswami (Paresh Rawal), the head of one of the biggest airline companies in the country, and puts forward his ideas, only to get rejected. How Maara achieves his dreams with the support of his mother Pechi (Urvashi), Bommi, and friends forms the plot of Soorarai Pottru.

movies.name: Rashmi Rocket
movies.cast: Taapsee Pannu, Priyanshu Painyuli and Abhishek Banerjee
movies.storyLine: Rashmi Rocket has Taapsee essaying the role of a sprinter for which she underwent major physical transformation.

movies.name: Sherni
movies.cast: Vidya Balan, Sharat Saxena, Vijay Raaz
movies.storyLine: A jaded forest officer (Vidya Balan) leads a team of trackers and locals intending to capture an unsettled tigress, while battling intense obstacles and pressures, both natural and man-made.

movies.name: Mimi
movies.cast: Kriti Sanon, Evelyn Edwards, Pankaj Tripathi
movies.storyLine: Mimi is introduced by Bhanu to an American couple as a surrogate in exchange for Rs 2 million. She decides to have the baby even when they change their mind and tells her parent that Bhanu is the father.
movies.criticRev: Kriti Sanon's labour of love leaves you with a sweet taste and a moist-eyed or two with its compassionate tale of strangers brought together under exceptional circumstances.

movies.name: Hungama 2
movies.cast: Paresh Rawal, Meezaan Jafri, Shilpa Shetty Kundra
movies.storyLine: A sequel of the 2003 film Hungama.Hungama 2 revolves around two families- the Kapoors and the Tiwaris. Colonel Kapoor (Ashutosh Rana) heads his kin which consist mainly of his younger son, Aakash (Meezaan) and three kids of his elder son. Other the other hand, the Tiwaris are a childless couple- Paresh Rawal as lawyer Radhe Shyam Tiwari and his younger wife Anjali (Shilpa Shetty). The lives of Kapoors and Tiwaris turn topsy-turvy when a woman, Vaani (Pranitha Subhash) shows up at the door with an illegitimate child.
movies.criticRev: In Hungama 2, Priyadarshan who is known to make you go rolling over the floor laughing with his climatic mayhems, settles for a creaky ride despite a bunch of seasoned actors boarding it. In a nutshell, this one barely does anything to 'steal your hearts.'

movies.name: Shershaah
movies.storyLine: Shershaah is a 2021 Bollywood biographical drama, directed by Vishnu Vardhan. The movie stars Sidharth Malhotra and Kiara Advani in the lead roles. The movie is based on the life of Captain Vikram Batra, an officer of the Indian Army.
movies.criticRev: Vishnu Varadhan and team execute the last thing in a gripping way, a little more focus on 'life and love' would have made Shershaah a fitting tribute to this braveheart whose story of martyrdom will continue to inspire generations to come.

movies.name: Haseen Dilruba
movies.storyLine: Haseen Dillruba revolves around a small-town woman Rani Kashyap (Taapsee Pannu) who is a Hindi pulp fiction aficionado. When her husband Rishi (Vikrant Massey) gets killed in an explosion, the needle of suspicion points towards her as she is hinted to be involved with another man (Harshvardhan Rane).
movies.criticRev: Taapsee Pannu as the bored housewife tries to make the best use of the erratic plot. However, when it comes to the femme fatale act, the actress is barely in her full form.

movies.name: Toofan
movies.storyLine: Toofaan is a 2021 Bollywood sports-drama, helmed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra. The movie star Farhan Akhtar, Paresh Rawal and Mrunal Thakur in the lead roles. In Toofan, Farhan will be essaying the role of a boxer.
movies.criticRev: If you are ready to brave this storm for just Farhan Akhtar's 'todun taak' punches!

movies.name: Saina
movies.storyLine: The story of Saina Nehwal, a professional badminton player who ranked number 1 in the sport.
